feed.title: NetBird Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.44.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [signal] adjust log levels by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3813
  • [signal] adjust signal log levels 2 by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3817
  • [client, android] Do not propagate empty routes by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3805
  • [management] Add connection type filter to Network Traffic API by @bcmmbaga in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3815
  • [management,client] PKCE add query parameter flag prompt=login or maxâ€¦ by @crn4 in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3824
  • [management] fix bug missed extra dns labels for a new peer by @crn4 in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3798
  • [client] Add FreeBSD desktop client support to OAuth flow by @hakansa in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3822
  • [signal] remove stream receive server side by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3820
  • [management] extend rest client lib by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3830
  • [client] Disable dnssec for systemd explicitly by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3831
  • [management] Make startup period configurable by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3767
  • [client] Offer to remove netbird data in windows uninstall by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3766

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.43.3...v0.44.0

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.45.0
entry.content:
Release Notes for v0.45.0

What's New

Client Enhancements

  • Introduced lazy connection support to optimize client startup and resource usage. You can learn more about the feature here. #3379
  • Fixed UI notification for new client versions. #3845
  • Resolved an issue with legacy route compatibility when connecting to older management servers (pre-v0.30.0). #3854

Management Enhancements

  • Added a flag to disable auto-migration, offering more control during deployments. #3840
  • Locking strength clause is now optional, improving compatibility and flexibility. #3844
  • Migrated the events SQLite store to GORM for more consistent database handling. #3837

Other Changes

  • Updated the issue template to streamline community feedback. #3842

Full Changelog: v0.44.0...v0.45.0

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.45.1
entry.content:
This release fixes an issue with traffic flow that caused endless reconnections for some peers.

What's Changed

  • [client] Add latest gzipped rotated log file to the debug bundle by @hakansa in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3848
  • [client] Do not reconnect to mgm server in case of handler error by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3856

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.45.0...v0.45.1

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.45.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [misc] Add CLA note by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3859
  • [misc] Fix CLA link in the PR template by @braginini in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3860
  • [management] lazy connection account setting by @pnmcosta in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3855
  • [management] Update traffic events pagination filters by @bcmmbaga in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3857
  • [management] Extend nameserver match domain validation by @bcmmbaga in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3864
  • [client] avoid overwriting state manager on iOS by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3870
  • [management] force account id on save groups update by @pnmcosta in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3850
  • [management/client/rest] Fix panic on unknown errors by @mohamed-essam in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3865
  • [management] Add correlated network traffic event schema by @bcmmbaga in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3680
  • [client, android] Fix/android enable server route by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3806
  • [management] Reset test containers after cleanup by @bcmmbaga in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3885
  • [server-test] Install libs for i386 tests by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3887
  • [client, android] Fix/notifier threading by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3807
  • [management] Prevent deletion of peers linked to network routers by @bcmmbaga in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3881
  • [client] Refactor exclude list handling to use a map for permanent connections by @hakansa in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3901
  • [management] Fix user groups propagation by @bcmmbaga in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3902
  • [client] Fix peer close deadlock by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3904

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.45.1...v0.45.2

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.45.3
entry.content:
